title: Rocks and Crystals - Tropical Trends
cleaned_text: ROCKS AND CRYSTALS There's a lot to be said about crystal healing, an alternative medicine practice that employs crystals and gemstones for a wide variety of healing and therapeutic properties. Though our personal beliefs in the healing properties of crystals vary, we think that whether or not you adhere to crystal healing, these beautiful stones provide ideal objects upon which to focus positive intentions. Much like filling a space with plants improves the feeling of the space, we find that crystals and gemstones infuse our homes and
